attributes.action: Make the Momentum AFO and Reaktiv AFO available on the NHS
attributes.additional_details:
The cost of the ankle orthotic is beyond the reach of most people and although costing £4-5k recipients of the orthotic would see a reduction in pain and increase in mobility. The need for invasive surgery wouldn't be required to try and reduce pain.
  The reduction in surgery would save costs to the NHS in the long run and also reduce patient waiting times
attributes.background: Make the Momentum and Reaktiv AFO available on the NHS  for those born with congenital conditions, arthritis, osteoarthritis, broken bones, failed invasive surgery resulting in severe pain or limited mobility of foot/ankle

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.

Decisions about which medical interventions to procure and use are an operational decision for the NHS, not the UK Government or Parliament.
